# textColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the text field’s content.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var textColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion



## Related Documentation

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the background the text field’s cell draws behind the text.
- **textColor**: The color to use to draw the cell’s text.
